text:
@realDonaldTrump 103,000+ #Covid19 deaths in the US under your watch. We’re hip to you trying to deflect. 

#DerekChauvin & the other thugs need to be arrested for killing #GeorgeFloyd Instead, you’re glorifying violence & giving the okay for cops to start shooting protestors. You’re deplorable.
